    • Field Detail

      • VERSION

        public static final java.lang.String VERSION
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • SSH_TAG

        public static final java.lang.String SSH_TAG
        Including this tag with a value like 'user@server.com', will cause commands to be run remotely through secure shell (ssh). The tag is optional. Leaving it out means you expect to run the commands on the ILS server itself.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • LOAD_DIR

        public static final java.lang.String LOAD_DIR

      • loadDelimitedEntry

        public static void loadDelimitedEntry(java.util.Properties props,
                      LibraryPropertyTypes libraryPropertyTypes,
                      java.util.List<java.lang.String> list)
        Parses a list of ',' comma separated types from a given entry in the environment properties file and returns them as a list for testing.
        Parameters:
        props - the Java Properties file that contains the entry of delimited entries.
        libraryPropertyTypes - the entry in the environment.properties file to be parsed into a list for returning.
        list - the value of list

      • setConfigDirectory

        public static void setConfigDirectory(java.lang.String configDirectory)
        Sets the config directory, the directory where all the config files can be found.
        Parameters:
        configDirectory -

      • getProperties

        public static java.util.Properties getProperties(ConfigFileTypes type)
        Gets specific properties from a configuration file.
        Parameters:
        type - of configuration file to read, ie environment or bimport etc.
        Returns:
        Java properties object filled with values read from the property file.
